Class FollowerService

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    The FollowerService class provides methods for use with the Follower SQL table

      • deleteFollowerService

        public static int deleteFollowerService(ClientRepository cRepo,
                                        FollowerRepository fRepo,
                                        java.lang.String usernameToUnfollow,
                                        java.lang.String username)
        Removes an entry from the Follower SQL table
        Parameters:
        cRepo - Client SQL table
        fRepo - Follower SQL table
        usernameToUnfollow - username of Client to be unfollowed in Follower SQL table
        username - username of Client wanting to unfollow usernameToUnfollow
        Returns:
        integer based on success or error of unfollowing

      • addFollowerService

        public static int addFollowerService(ClientRepository cRepo,
                                     FollowerRepository fRepo,
                                     int follower_id,
                                     java.lang.String usernameToFollow,
                                     java.lang.String username)
        Adds an entry to the Follower SQL table
        Parameters:
        cRepo - Client SQL table
        fRepo - Follower SQL table
        follower_id - ID in Follower SQL table, increments based on amount of entries in Follower SQL table
        usernameToFollow - username of Client to be followed
        username - username of Client wanting to follow
        Returns:
        integer based on success or error of following
